content:
Project PG26794 - SKU 1

Description: Premium Coffee Pouch - 12oz Stand-up
Production Type: Digital Flexo
Material/Substrate: Metallized PET/PE Laminate 3.5mil
Color Requirements: 4C Process + Metallic Silver + UV Spot
Proof Requirements: Digital proof + Press proof required
Varnishes: UV Spot Varnish on logo area
Special Effects: Holographic foil accent on brand name
File Location: /projects/pg26794/artwork/coffee_pouch_v3.pdf

Project Manager: John Smith
Salesperson: Sarah Johnson
Notes: Customer requires metallic finish for premium look

Project PG26794 Overview

Project Manager: John Smith
Salesperson: Sarah Johnson
Total SKUs: 1

Project Summary: Premium coffee packaging with metallic finishes and special effects. Requires high-end production capabilities with UV spot varnish and holographic foil application.

SKU Details:
- SKU 1: Premium Coffee Pouch using Metallized PET/PE substrate
- Production: Digital Flexo with 4C + Metallic Silver + UV
- Special Features: Holographic foil, UV spot varnish

Notes: Customer requires metallic finish for premium look

Project PG27851 - SKU 1

Description: Snack Bar Wrapper - Multi-pack
Production Type: Gravure
Material/Substrate: BOPP/PE Laminate
Color Requirements: 6C Process + White Base
Proof Requirements: Digital proof only
Varnishes: Matte OPV overall
Special Effects: None
File Location: /projects/pg27851/artwork/snack_wrapper_final.pdf

Project Manager: Lisa Chen
Salesperson: Mike Rodriguez
Notes: High volume run - efficiency focused

Project PG28902 - SKU 1

Description: Luxury Box Label - Wine Collection
Production Type: Digital Sheet-fed
Material/Substrate: Textured Paper Stock 120gsm
Color Requirements: 4C + 2 Spot (Gold + Burgundy)
Proof Requirements: Digital + Physical substrate proof
Varnishes: UV Spot on gold elements
Special Effects: Embossed logo, Foil stamping
File Location: /projects/pg28902/artwork/wine_label_v2.pdf

Project Manager: David Park
Salesperson: Jennifer Walsh
Notes: Premium wine label - quality critical

Project PG28902 Overview

Project Manager: David Park
Salesperson: Jennifer Walsh
Total SKUs: 1

Project Summary: Luxury wine label production with premium finishes. High-end paper stock with embossing and foil stamping for premium brand positioning.

SKU Details:
- SKU 1: Luxury wine label using textured paper substrate
- Production: Digital sheet-fed with spot colors
- Special Features: Embossed logo, gold foil stamping, UV spot varnish

Notes: Premium wine label - quality critical
